summary: The signs look a bit more aged and have store names written in latvian.
descriptionHtml:
[B]LV[/B]
Uzlabots izkārtņu un ceļa rādītāji, kas tagad izskatās vairāk novecojuši un ar uzrakstiem latviešu valodā. Uzrakstos izmantota vecā druka.

[B]EN[/B]
Improved store and road signs, which now look more aged and have names written in latvian. Old latvian print was used in the names.

[B]Install[/b]
Vienkārši visu ieliec [Skyrim instalācijas mape]/Data
Just place everything in [Skyrim install folder]/Data
author: KaralisArturs
